PM Tuesday, January 18, 2011 WINDSOR, Ontario- Chrysler is debating the future of its minivans even as it starts making the 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week. We need to completely rethink the minivan, CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made.`` We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile.'' Sergio Marchionne said that could mean new products

Jan. 23( Bloomberg)-- Former Secretary of State Colin Powell , a Republican who supported Democratic Barack Obama in the 2008 election, said he's not committed' to supporting Barack Obama or a specific Republican candidate in 2012.`` I'm not committed to Barack Obama , I'm not committed to a Republican candidate, Colin Powell , a retired Army general who was chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, said on CNN's`` State of the Union'' program today. Colin Powell said he won't decide whom to vote
